Content: if servers of an ecosystem are paid (explorers, pools, exchanges) but prices of all alts = 0, I think that big actors will quit and only fans will continue to pay for servers. Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content:
Just for anyone that does not know what the big plan is, here is a break down from a outsider looking in.

DEX is going to be very important soon, so will privacy coins. But the problem with DEXs have been they have been hard to use and low liquidity. Hard to use can be fixed by GUIs such as hyperDEX/atomicDEX/Chainmakers so liquidity is the biggest issue.

For the liquidity problem, kmd team and my dev are designing the market maker backend. With this, once hooked up to hyperDEX, any grandma can generate API keys for their fav exchange, have some coins in the hyperDEX wallet and be able to set a profit % above CEX prices. Let's say i want 5% profit. When someone buys on the DEX, the CEX will autobuy/sell.

Now who does not like free money? But my pal seeing that i am making free money, starts to use this too but to make more money instead of setting 5% he does 4.9% to undercut me. I see what he is doing so i change to 4.8%. Now we have a race to the bottom.

Author: klein#5233
Content: but if you rush and getsomething wrong than this is bad

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: This arb bot will bring in all the liquidity we need, this then brings in users then in brings people just setting limit orders directly without the bot

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: Additionally things like cc-peg will bring liquidity .

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Now there will be a % at which some think is too small to make a profit from but others will still take it. The market will self balance with people leaving and people coming.

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: So now we have solved the liquidity issue. Now CEX will want to hook into OUR liquidity as we will have a GLOBAL orderbook.

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: We will become the center of the crypto space, interconnecting all the exchanges and all the coin communities

Author: richardt#2807
Content: Realistically, how far away is atomicDEX from achieving that?

Author: hyperDEX#6586

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: atomicDEX is a convenience tool, the team game changer will be once mm2.0 is complete but in the mean time hyperDEX and chainmakers can fill in that gap
